question.instruction: In the text below some words are missing. Click on each blank, a list of choices will appear. Select the appropriate answer choice for each blank. To undo answer choice, click on reset button.

template.description: Giant pandas are black-and-white Chinese bears that are on the verge of {blank}. These large, cuddly-looking mammals have a big head, a heavy body, rounded ears, and a short tail. Most bears' eyes have round pupils. The {blank} is the giant panda, whose pupils are vertical slits, like cats' eyes, these unusual eyes {blank} the Chinese to call the panda the "giant cat bear."
